//Sentinel4SAP solution version 2.0.33 
let SystemRolesDictionary= dynamic({"unknown":"Production", "":"Production", "P":"Production", "T": "Test", "C": "Customizing", "D": "Demo", "E": "Training/Education", "S":"SAP reference"});
let D_SAP_HeartBeat_CL = datatable(TimeGenerated:datetime 
,agent_id:string
,agent_ver:string
,host:string
,system_id:string
,push_timestamp:real
,agent_timezone:string
,sap_client_category: string 
,sap_rfc_dest: string 
,Type:string
)['1000-01-01T00:00:00Z','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString',1.1111,'initialString'
,'initialString','initialString','initialString'];
let T_SAP_HeartBeat_CL = (SAP_HeartBeat_CL | project 
TimeGenerated = column_ifexists('TimeGenerated', '1000-01-01T00:00:00Z')
,agent_id = column_ifexists('agent_id_s', column_ifexists('agent_id_g', 'initialString'))
,agent_ver = column_ifexists('agent_ver_s', 'initialString')
,host = column_ifexists('host_s', 'initialString')
,system_id = column_ifexists('system_id_s', 'initialString')
,push_timestamp = column_ifexists('push_timestamp_d', 1.1111)
,agent_timezone = column_ifexists('agent_timezone_s', 'initialString')
,Type = column_ifexists('Type', 'initialString')
,sap_client_category= column_ifexists('sap_client_category_s','initialString')
,sap_rfc_dest= column_ifexists('sap_rfc_dest','initialString')
);
T_SAP_HeartBeat_CL | union isfuzzy= true (D_SAP_HeartBeat_CL  | where TimeGenerated != '1000-01-01T00:00:00Z')
| extend SystemRole= tostring(SystemRolesDictionary[sap_client_category])
